Name: Run For Your Life
About the game: Run For Your Life is a simple survival-collectathon with some light horror elements and strong 90s cartoon vibes, from the music to the artwork. Also you play as a potato. Armed with a genuine homerun baseball bat, you'll have to pull out all the stops to survive and collect all the JUNK in a level. Run and smash and hide until the timer reaches zero, when the teleporter drops a beam down for you to escape. Our teleporters take time to charge up - get creative until we're able to get you out! -Set traps and make barricades using your environment. Every object can be moved, repaired, or destroyed. -Use smaller objects as improvised weapons and projectiles. Send a chair flying into a crowd, instant chaos. -Exchange junk for better weapons and customize your appearance with unlockable outfits. -Multiple ways to win! Collect all junk for a faster ride home, barricade yourself like a turtle, or run like a madman. -Level layouts remain static, but everything inside of them changes between playthroughs. Each run will play differently. Points collected are used to unlock levels, cosmetics, weapons, and abilities.
